wikipedia_page.main: Thomas Perceval Fielden (24 November 1883 – 15 September 1974) was a British pianist and music teacher.  He was director of music at three public schools (Hurstpierpoint College, Fettes and Charterhouse) and was Professor of Pianoforte at the Royal College of Music for over 30 years.  He wrote on the subject of piano technique and gave many recitals.
